name: read-aloud
description: A Chrome extension that reads aloud the webpage's content with just one click. Support 40+ languages.

scripts.package: zip -u -r build/package.zip _locales css img js *.html manifest.json -x js/embed.js || true
scripts.sync-page-scripts: aws s3 sync --profile s3 --delete --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=86400,public page-scripts s3://lsdsoftware-assets/read-aloud/page-scripts

author: Hai Phan <hai.phan@gmail.com>
